alert.note: Alert for Berks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Berks County through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wyomissing, or near Reading, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reading, Birdsboro, Shillington, Mount Penn, Mohnton, Kenhorst, St. Lawrence, Lorane, Reiffton and Flying Hills. This includes Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 7 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
